headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://js.stripe.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.stripe.com https://api.notion.com; frame-src https://js.stripe.com;
